changes to make the tap.md php output into edit-* test files:

  sed -i -e 's/tap\.md/example.com/g' dnssync/services/zoneedit/test_data/edit-*
  sed -i -e 's/svc\.zoneedit@cadit\.com/foo@example.com/g' dnssync/services/zoneedit/test_data/edit-*
  sed -i -e 's/svc\.zone\.\.\.adit\.com/foo@example.com/g' dnssync/services/zoneedit/test_data/edit-*

  sed -i -e 's/tap\.md/example.com/g' dnssync/services/zoneedit/test_data/confirm-*
  sed -i -e 's/svc\.zoneedit@cadit\.com/foo@example.com/g' dnssync/services/zoneedit/test_data/confirm-*
  sed -i -e 's/svc\.zone\.\.\.adit\.com/foo@example.com/g' dnssync/services/zoneedit/test_data/confirm-*
